scene_description_enriched: A bearded man, likely a monk or hermit, with a halo, is depicted reading a book. He wears a reddish-brown hooded robe with gold trim. To his left, a small, grey building with a rounded archway and decorative elements is visible. The background features green foliage and a blue sky with distant hills. To the right of the man, a grey, animal-like creature with large eyes peers out from behind him, possibly representing a temptation or a symbolic animal.
